A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion","dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kill 'Em All
Bałkańska vendetta
Kill'em All
programme.desc:
Kill 'Em All: Directed by Peter Malota. With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Autumn Reeser, Peter Stormare, Maria Conchita Alonso. After a massive shootout, a mysterious stranger (Van Damme) arrives at a local hospital on the brink of death. Then, a foreign gang brazenly comes to the hospital to hunt him down. His nurse, the sole surviving witness to the follow-up shootout, must face an FBI interrogation that unlocks a plot of international intrigue and revenge. With enough twists and turns, KILL'EM ALL will keep you guessing until the final bullet is fired." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5767628/","name":"Kill 'Em All","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxZGNlOGQtYjhjOS00NjI3LTliYzgtZTRiNWZlN2NlZjA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTg4MDYyNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a massive shootout, a mysterious stranger (Van Damme) arrives at a local hospital on the brink of death. Then, a foreign gang brazenly comes to the hospital to hunt him down. His nurse, the sole surviving witness to the follow-","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5767628/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deepfrieddodo"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"No Redeeming Factors","reviewBody":"Terrible acting from a poor cast following possibly the worst script of any action film (and that's saying a lot). It's just a really bad film. The acting is genuinely awful but that is largely down to cringeworthy writing. The plot has a deep background and it seems to have twists and monumental moments in parts, but these are unrecognisable as you're too far gone to even consider trying to follow what on earth is going on.

The sad thing is JCVD does nothing wrong, plus it seems that this film at least had a half decent budget. Even the choreography for the fights are bad, if you're hiring JCVD the least you need to do is utilise his martial arts abilities. Instead there's nothing special as he fights naff characters.

The reason I give this 3 is because it is actually a film, there is a (poor) beginning, leading to (an even worse) middle, and (equally terrible) ending (complete with someone taking off a wig (that looks like real hair) to reveal her natural hair (which is quite clearly a wig)). There is some semblance of a plot there, and really I feel bad for JCVD for being associated with this when he was given no chance of improving it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2466,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2017-06-12","keywords":"martial arts,violence,hospital,flashback,told in flashback","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3346251289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTllYzAzNmMtZGQxMy00MzhlLWIxYjMtNWRjZjNkZjUxZTBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTllYzAzNmMtZGQxMy00MzhlLWIxYjMtNWRjZjNkZjUxZTBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000241/","name":"Jean-Claude Van Damme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1032208/","name":"Autumn Reeser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001780/","name":"Peter Stormare"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525782/","name":"Peter Malota"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017834/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0606718/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3202669/","name":"Jesse Cilio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2272591/","name":"Brian Smolensky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8180547/","name":"Craig Stewart"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Open Season: Directed by Roger Allers, Jill Culton, Anthony Stacchi. With Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise, Debra Messing. Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0400717/","name":"Open Season","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwOTg2MjU0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIzNTQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest anim","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0400717/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aperez999"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Who'd have thunk?","reviewBody":"Matin Lawrence and Ashton Kutcher rock as the big bear "Boog" and the comic sidekick deer "Elliot". Unfortunately, the story was bland and the jokes were only mildly funny, so it will not be one of the best kids movies you're going to see this year. The "Laugh out loud" index was maybe a 5-10 (laughs per movie). "Over the Hedge" was closer to 20-30 for comparative purposes. "Boog" and "Elliot" were well played. The Scottish squirrels, Beavers and Rabbits were funny, but the rest of the characters didn't make much of an impression. Although somewhat entertaining, it was quickly forgotten after we left the theater (with the exception of the Austin Powers like shadow scene behind the curtain). programme.title: Open Season 3
Sezon na misia 3
Open Season 3
programme.desc:
Open Season 3: Directed by Cody Cameron. With Matthew J. Munn, Nika Futterman, Maddie Taylor, André Sogliuzzo. Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1646926/","name":"Open Season 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlmZWUxZjctYmVmZS00MTNlLTllZmMtNGZiMjIzOWRlY2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIzODI5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1646926/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Probably the Death of a Series","reviewBody":"Boog plans a guy's trip, but all his friends back out for one reason or another. He goes alone and stumbles on to a circus and a beautiful female bear named Ursa. Switching places with a male bear named Doug, his friends in the forest soon become worried.

The reviews for this film are not stellar, and I think I can sum up why: the original voice cast is not involved in this picture, so the characters sound funny. The plot is thin, and the movie comes in under 90 minutes, letting you know that they didn't have a strong story (even including the dogs and cats seems forced because it is not related to the main story at all).

For me, I liked the film. I don't have a strong attachment to the original, so I wasn't as offended. And I think kids will like it. Sure, the voice for Boog was annoying... but then, I loved the dogs and cats, so it's a toss-up. I felt like this was going to be a launching pad for a TV series, because it has a "Madagascar" feel to it... but with its poor reception, that may not be likely.

If you have kids, let them check it out. They may be less cynical than adult viewers, and it's not all bad. I learned what a camelid is... that may be worth the price of renting the film. But then again, maybe not. My girlfriend watched it with me and fell asleep... what does that tell you?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-01-25","keywords":"russian,circus,prince and pauper,look alike,role reversal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Open Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi205691161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends really to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3103829/","name":"Matthew J. IMDb data; ttnr: 1646926, Title: Open Season 3, --- Description: Open Season 3: Directed by Cody Cameron. With Matthew J. Munn, Nika Futterman, Maddie Taylor, André Sogliuzzo. Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1646926/","name":"Open Season 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlmZWUxZjctYmVmZS00MTNlLTllZmMtNGZiMjIzOWRlY2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjIzODI5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1646926/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942","dateCreated":"2011-01-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Probably the Death of a Series","reviewBody":"Boog plans a guy's trip, but all his friends back out for one reason or another. He goes alone and stumbles on to a circus and a beautiful female bear named Ursa. Switching places with a male bear named Doug, his friends in the forest soon become worried.

The reviews for this film are not stellar, and I think I can sum up why: the original voice cast is not involved in this picture, so the characters sound funny. The plot is thin, and the movie comes in under 90 minutes, letting you know that they didn't have a strong story (even including the dogs and cats seems forced because it is not related to the main story at all).

For me, I liked the film. I don't have a strong attachment to the original, so I wasn't as offended. And I think kids will like it. Sure, the voice for Boog was annoying... but then, I loved the dogs and cats, so it's a toss-up. I felt like this was going to be a launching pad for a TV series, because it has a "Madagascar" feel to it... but with its poor reception, that may not be likely.

If you have kids, let them check it out. They may be less cynical than adult viewers, and it's not all bad. I learned what a camelid is... that may be worth the price of renting the film. But then again, maybe not. My girlfriend watched it with me and fell asleep... what does that tell you?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11099,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-01-25","keywords":"russian,circus,prince and pauper,look alike,role reversal","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Open Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi205691161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NjExNjI0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg3MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Boog's friends really to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3103829/","name":"Matthew J. programme.title: Priest
Ksiądz
Priest
programme.desc:
Priest: Directed by Scott Stewart. With Paul Bettany, Karl Urban, Cam Gigandet, Maggie Q. A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0822847/","name":"Priest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ1MTAwODc3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzI0MDQ3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0822847/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xamtaro"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kick Ass Clergy, Holy Mediocrity!","reviewBody":"Visual effects developer-turned-director, Scott Stewart, delivers his second supernatural action film that claims to be "adapted" from the comic book "Priest". Supposedly based on a Korean comic or "manhwa" of same name, the movie "Priest" has NOTHING to do with the original, not even the name of the squinting "strong silent type" main protagonist played by Paul Bettany. Fallen angels, deal with a demon, multiple time frame story lines and all other interesting elements of the original be damned. And perhaps it was for the better since the manhwa's multiple story lines taking place in the Crusades, the old west and the future would just confuse the heck out of everyone.

So they crafted a whole new premise to appeal to the superficial summer action lover. And the one thing they did right was to give us vampires that do not sparkle in the sunlight. These vampires are all teeth and claws who swarm across the world at night attacking from giant hives, a clear reference to the "Aliens" franchise. These savage beasts have been at constant war with mankind since the dawn of time. A beautifully bloody animated prologue sets the back-story of the film about how mankind's salvation came in the form of the Priests, holy warriors who battled the vampire hordes to near extinction.

This story revolves around one of the veteran priests who lives among the other downtrodden human inhabitants of a walled dystopian city ruled by the now totalitarian church. When he receives word that his niece was abducted by a murderous pack of vampires, the priest breaks his sacred vows to venture out of the city and rescue her. He is joined on his crusade by his niece's boyfriend, a young trigger-finger wasteland sheriff. But as the duo soon discover, reports of the vampires' return have been greatly understated. With a powerful yet familiar threat is leading the newly reformed vampire hordes, the wayward Priest and his companion must fend off supernatural foes and contend with a group of fellow Priests sent to hunt down their rogue brother.

"Priest" is one cliché storm of a film that commits the cardinal sins of a paper thin plot and forgettable characters thanks to the inexperience of first time writer Cory Goodman. The characters are so forgettable that the writer never even bothered to give many of them names. Paul Bettany's main character is just called "Priest" (It is not his name by the way). There is also "Black Hat" (because he wears a black hat) and "The Priestess" (because she is a female priest) just to name a few. They are less like actual characters and more like blank character archetypes thrown in for plot convenience. Archetypes like Cam Gigandet's hot headed Sheriff Hicks (a second reference to Aliens perhaps?) and Lily Collin's damsel in distress Lucy are just as forgettable even though they do have names.

Failing to provide interesting characters or a good story, the least the producers could do was to deliver a holy hell load of violence with a hard R or M18 rating. Sadly the animated prologue has more blood and guts than the entire film combined since most of the gorier battles take place in darkness or amid dust. The Fights are well choreographed but they tend to be more stylish than practical and sometimes border on illogical. For example, a duel on a high speed train is awesome but none of the combatants ever thought of kicking his opponent off the side? But despite these failings of the flesh, some salvation comes to "Priest" in the form of an excellent production design. From the dark cyberpunk inspired Church city to the post apocalyptic western towns dotting the hostile desert lands, great attention had been paid to make those places as believable as possible. Perhaps most memorable would be the tech on display in the film which includes futuristic motorcycles, tricked out shotguns and the Priests' arsenal of deadly cross-themed blade weapons.

Beyond the props, flawless visual effects and startling CGI, the movie tries as well to inject its narrative with deeper subtexts. The Priests themselves call to mind stories of War veterans who were shunned by society and unable to re-integrate, a theme made most famous in "Rambo: First Blood". The film also makes fun of how some churches twist their religion into a means of control, the hypocritical "holier-than-thou" attitude of modern Christians and their single minded belief that they remain "saved from evil" as long as they worship God. It is not intentionally "anti-Christian" or "anti-catholic". It is more of a clever satire but there will always be the more conservative ones who would cry sacrilege.

At only 87 minutes long, Priest moves at a brisk pace and at the very least it is not boring. It would no doubt entertain action junkies and fans of post apocalyptic thrillers although more time could have been spent developing the characters or delving into the underlying themes that were addressed. Priest is spectacular but soulless, with a nice looking "body" but barely enough "blood" and "spirit" to satisfy the more sophisticated movie goer.

6.5/10 Rounded down to 6","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":118298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"keywords":"vampire,priest,church,warrior,vampire hunter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Priest: Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4157250841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NjcwNzAzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTczNTM5NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NjcwNzAzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTczNTM5NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0079273/","name":"Paul Bettany"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1544217/","name":"Cam Gigandet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702572/","name":"Maggie Q"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0829820/","name":"Scott Stewart"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174505/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242736/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2309430/","name":"Cory Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2312828/","name":"Min-Woo Hyung"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

Bakery/cafe owner Hannah is also an amateur sleuth solving murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13174748/","name":"Murder, She Baked","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU0NTYxYWUtNjdkYS00ZjcyLWJlNjUtNjdlNjM3NjdlZDQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUwNDU1MTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bakery/cafe owner Hannah is also an amateur sleuth solving murders.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13174748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cgvsluis"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"I think this is my favorite of the Hallmark Mystery series.","reviewBody":"I absolutely love Hannah Swensen and the Murder She Baked Mystery Series. The curious and observant single baker Hannah is endearing and her chemistry with both Mike and Norman is spot on. Her mom is fabulous as the meddling mother...along with her serious Eden Lake police officer brother-in-law and co-conspirator sister.

I'd love to try some of her baked goods and I was inspired to read the books this series was based on.

My three favorite Hallmark Mystery Series remain: Hannah Swensen's Murder she Baked, Aurora Teagarden Mysteries, and Mystery 101.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":316,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"genre":["Mystery"],"datePublished":"2015-05-02","keywords":"tv mini series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842081/","name":"Alison Sweeney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558950/","name":"Cameron Mathison"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018271/","name":"Barbara Niven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799012/","name":"Nancey Silvers"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: L.A.'s Finest
L.A.'s Finest
L.A.'s Finest
programme.desc: L.A.'s Finest: Created by Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier. With Jessica Alba, Gabrielle Union, Duane Martin, Zach Gilford. The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. programme.title: Grimsby
Grimsby
The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: Grimsby: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Sacha Baron Cohen, Rebel Wilson, Freddie Crowder, Jon-Jon Lockwood. A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3381008/","name":"Grimsby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTE3MjMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc5NjQxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3381008/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"mix bag of outrageous humor","reviewBody":"Nobby Butcher (Sacha Baron Cohen) is an idiot football hooligan from Grimsby and has 11 children with Dawn (Rebel Wilson). He is looking to reconnect with estranged brother Sebastian Graves (Mark Strong). Sebastian is now a gunman for an MI6 offshoot. His investigation leads to actress philanthropist Rhonda George (Penelope Cruz). Nobby's interference causes Sebastian to be blamed for an assassination. Sebastian is forced to team up with his secret brother Nobby.\n\nNobby is partially annoying. Once I get over it, his idiocy is a little funny. It's all silly and outrageous. I'm half rolling my eyes, and half smirking in disbelief. I'm bored with the poop jokes and the more obvious stuff. The shock humor is over the top. On the other hand, SBC often hits the audience with some unexpected humor. IMDb data; ttnr: 3381008, Title: Grimsby, --- Description: Grimsby: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Sacha Baron Cohen, Rebel Wilson, Freddie Crowder, Jon-Jon Lockwood. A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3381008/","name":"Grimsby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTE3MjMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc5NjQxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3381008/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle","dateCreated":"2017-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"mix bag of outrageous humor","reviewBody":"Nobby Butcher (Sacha Baron Cohen) is an idiot football hooligan from Grimsby and has 11 children with Dawn (Rebel Wilson). He is looking to reconnect with estranged brother Sebastian Graves (Mark Strong). Sebastian is now a gunman for an MI6 offshoot. His investigation leads to actress philanthropist Rhonda George (Penelope Cruz). Nobby's interference causes Sebastian to be blamed for an assassination. Sebastian is forced to team up with his secret brother Nobby.\n\nNobby is partially annoying. Once I get over it, his idiocy is a little funny. It's all silly and outrageous. I'm half rolling my eyes, and half smirking in disbelief. I'm bored with the poop jokes and the more obvious stuff. The shock humor is over the top. On the other hand, SBC often hits the audience with some unexpected humor. It's a real mix bag.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-24","keywords":"gay joke,bare breasts,public nudity,sex in public,water hose","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3359027737","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MzMyNDAyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMyNjU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MzMyNDAyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMyNjU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Sebastian Graves, a deadly MI6 agent, takes on a mission to prevent a massive global terror attack, he must unfortunately reunite with his long-lost brother Nobby, a sweet but dimwitted English football hooligan ... proving that behind every great spy is an embarrassing sibling.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056187/","name":"Sacha Baron Cohen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0835016/","name":"Mark Strong","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2313103/","name":"Rebel Wilson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504642/","name":"Louis Leterrier"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0255853/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131363/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056187/","name":"Sacha Baron Cohen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601882/","name":"Phil Johnston","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham"],"duration":"PT1H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Underworld: Rise of the Lycans: Directed by Patrick Tatopoulos. With Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy, Rhona Mitra, Steven Mackintosh. An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0834001/","name":"Underworld: Rise of the Lycans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1OTU5ODc0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYyMDUwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0834001/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Thanos_Alfie"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Lycans are here...","reviewBody":""Underworld: Rise of the Lycans" is the third movie of the Underworld series and in this one we are back in time where the race of aristocratic vampires had Lycans as their slaves and we watch how they rise up against the cruel vampire king and what happened next.

I liked this movie because it was something really different from all the other vampire movies and I also liked the thing that it turned us so back to show us how the things were there and how all this things started from the beginning of them. The interpretations of Michael Sheen who plays as Lucian, Rhona Mitra who plays as Sonja and Bill Nighy who plays as Viktor were simply outstanding.

Finally I have to tell you that I strongly recommend this movie such as all of the Underworld movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":156299,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Fantasy","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-02-04","keywords":"vampire,slave,werewolf,prequel,sword fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Underworld: Rise of the Lycans","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3494969369","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzgwNzAxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTEzNTEwMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzgwNzAxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTEzNTEwMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An origins story centered on the centuries-old feud between the the race of aristocratic vampires known as Death Dealers, and their onetime slaves, the Lycans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593961/","name":"Rhona Mitra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790688/","name":"Michael Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0631490/","name":"Bill Nighy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851281/","name":"Patrick Tatopoulos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564286/","name":"Danny McBride"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085736/","name":"Dirk Blackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564586/","name":"Howard McCain"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Triple Threat
Potrójne zagrożenie
Triple Threat
programme.desc: Triple Threat: Directed by Jesse V. Johnson. With Tony Jaa, Tiger Hu Chen, Iko Uwais, Scott Adkins. When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6643972/","name":"Triple Threat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY1MjRhYmYtZDg4Yy00ZWRiLWIwYzktZThkY2E0YjZlNjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc3MjY3NTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a billionaire's daughter intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate is targeted by a group of professional assassins, a team of mercenaries must stop them before they kill her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6643972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"canike07"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awesome 80's/90's style Martial Arts Flick!","reviewBody":"Just returned from the one night only screening st my local AMC theatre and was not disappointed! The film reminded me of all the flicks I used to see in the theatre with my dad back in the 80s/90s before they all became Marvel/fast and furious type of movies. The action was top notch and while the story is what you would expect from this kind of movie, sort of just a set up so all the stars can kick the hell out of each other and man do they ever! The director Jesse Johnson did a great job in letting everyone get there screen time and able to show there signature moves (Jaa's elbow/knee strikes, Adkins flip/spin kicks) the action was quite impressive, better than most big Hollywood films. Fans of martial arts/action films will not be disappointed as well as fans of the individual stars. All get pretty equal screen time. The finale as well as a great sequence in a police station are the highlights! Support this movie and rent on demand, buy blu Ray etc. Great job to all involved!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-03-29","keywords":"muscleman,prisoner of war,captivity,police officer,police officer killed","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3570383129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdhMGRkMWItMGQzZi00Yjg0LWJhMmQtMDc1Njk0ZDE5YjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdhMGRkMWItMGQzZi00Yjg0LWJhMmQtMDc1Njk0ZDE5YjExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of professional assassins are hired to take out a billionaire's daughter who is intent on bringing down a major crime syndicate. A down and out team of mercenaries, must take on the assassins and stop them before they kill their target."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1388074/","name":"Tony Jaa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155392/","name":"Tiger Hu Chen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3299397/","name":"Iko Uwais"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425364/","name":"Jesse V. programme.title: Eat Pray Love

Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Eat Pray Love: Directed by Ryan Murphy. With Julia Roberts, I. Gusti Ayu Puspawati, Hadi Subiyanto, Billy Crudup. A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0879870/","name":"Eat Pray Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDkyNzkyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQyNDk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0879870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystic Julia","reviewBody":"Most people I know are going to see this film for Julia Roberts. It is that mysterious link that film stars create with their audiences. We develop a sort of craving to see them again. So a new Julia Roberts movie? Sure. Absolutely. I'm only a few years younger than Julia Roberts which means we have grown together. So, to see her play a woman facing a sort of middle age crisis makes you look inwards with a smile, the nervous kind. I must also say I'm a guy, heterosexual, but not fanatically so. I don't have the fears that, Jay Leno for instance, shows, when confronted by a "chick flick" If anything "Eat Pray Love" proves that men and women are not that far apart, we simply deal with the same problems in different ways. Here, the filmmakers don't shy away from the conflict and the balance is real. Julia's husband, played beautifully by Billy Crudup, accuses her of leaving the marriage without an explanation. He is the one with the broken heart. In Italy, Julia eats and our own gastric juices start to do their thing. I glanced at my watch, I was ready to run into the nearest Italian restaurant and have a relationship with a pizza myself. Italy, Rome and even Naples look so clean that I hardly recognized it. CGI? Luca Argentero plays Julia's tutor/tourist guide. He is a good looking guy that after appearing in the Italian version of the Big Brother reality show, he became a sort of local movie star and shows promising acting chops. Here, strangely enough, he looks small but charming all the same. India brings the wonderful Richard Jenkins and a solid piece of advise: "don't give up on love" Bali, well, Bali is something else and it is there that Javier Bardem comes into the picture and provides us with the best scene in the film. I'm not going to tell you what it is but let me just say that involves his son and gives us, finally, a side of Julia we didn't know how much we missed. Empathy. Feeling something for somebody else's feelings. I think I may see the film a second time just to see that scene again. I also should mention that James Franco plays a young actor - not what I call a stretch - considering he is my favorite of the young actors around. I will challenge other members of my sex to go and see it. Not to be afraid to feel identified or even chocked up. I can assure you it's not going to diminish you manliness in any way and will awake your appetites, big time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93565,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-10-06","keywords":"emotional balance,indonesia,inner peace,young woman,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eat Pray Love: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2996176409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Happily married Elizabeth Gilbert (Roberts) takes a right turn in her life by enduring a painful divorce and proceeding to take a round-the-world journey of self-enlightenment and fulfillment. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000849/","name":"Javier Bardem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759022/","name":"Jennifer Salt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2418691/","name":"Elizabeth Gilbert"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0879870/","name":"Eat Pray Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDkyNzkyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQyNDk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0879870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystic Julia","reviewBody":"Most people I know are going to see this film for Julia Roberts. It is that mysterious link that film stars create with their audiences. We develop a sort of craving to see them again. So a new Julia Roberts movie? Sure. Absolutely. I'm only a few years younger than Julia Roberts which means we have grown together. So, to see her play a woman facing a sort of middle age crisis makes you look inwards with a smile, the nervous kind. I must also say I'm a guy, heterosexual, but not fanatically so. I don't have the fears that, Jay Leno for instance, shows, when confronted by a "chick flick" If anything "Eat Pray Love" proves that men and women are not that far apart, we simply deal with the same problems in different ways. Here, the filmmakers don't shy away from the conflict and the balance is real. Julia's husband, played beautifully by Billy Crudup, accuses her of leaving the marriage without an explanation. He is the one with the broken heart. In Italy, Julia eats and our own gastric juices start to do their thing. I glanced at my watch, I was ready to run into the nearest Italian restaurant and have a relationship with a pizza myself. Italy, Rome and even Naples look so clean that I hardly recognized it. CGI? Luca Argentero plays Julia's tutor/tourist guide. He is a good looking guy that after appearing in the Italian version of the Big Brother reality show, he became a sort of local movie star and shows promising acting chops. Here, strangely enough, he looks small but charming all the same. India brings the wonderful Richard Jenkins and a solid piece of advise: "don't give up on love" Bali, well, Bali is something else and it is there that Javier Bardem comes into the picture and provides us with the best scene in the film. I'm not going to tell you what it is but let me just say that involves his son and gives us, finally, a side of Julia we didn't know how much we missed. Empathy. Feeling something for somebody else's feelings. I think I may see the film a second time just to see that scene again. I also should mention that James Franco plays a young actor - not what I call a stretch - considering he is my favorite of the young actors around. I will challenge other members of my sex to go and see it. Not to be afraid to feel identified or even chocked up. I can assure you it's not going to diminish you manliness in any way and will awake your appetites, big time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93565,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-10-06","keywords":"emotional balance,indonesia,inner peace,young woman,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eat Pray Love: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2996176409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Happily married Elizabeth Gilbert (Roberts) takes a right turn in her life by enduring a painful divorce and proceeding to take a round-the-world journey of self-enlightenment and fulfillment. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0879870/","name":"Eat Pray Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDkyNzkyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQyNDk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0879870/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena","dateCreated":"2010-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystic Julia","reviewBody":"Most people I know are going to see this film for Julia Roberts. It is that mysterious link that film stars create with their audiences. We develop a sort of craving to see them again. So a new Julia Roberts movie? Sure. Absolutely. I'm only a few years younger than Julia Roberts which means we have grown together. So, to see her play a woman facing a sort of middle age crisis makes you look inwards with a smile, the nervous kind. I must also say I'm a guy, heterosexual, but not fanatically so. I don't have the fears that, Jay Leno for instance, shows, when confronted by a "chick flick" If anything "Eat Pray Love" proves that men and women are not that far apart, we simply deal with the same problems in different ways. Here, the filmmakers don't shy away from the conflict and the balance is real. Julia's husband, played beautifully by Billy Crudup, accuses her of leaving the marriage without an explanation. He is the one with the broken heart. In Italy, Julia eats and our own gastric juices start to do their thing. I glanced at my watch, I was ready to run into the nearest Italian restaurant and have a relationship with a pizza myself. Italy, Rome and even Naples look so clean that I hardly recognized it. CGI? Luca Argentero plays Julia's tutor/tourist guide. He is a good looking guy that after appearing in the Italian version of the Big Brother reality show, he became a sort of local movie star and shows promising acting chops. Here, strangely enough, he looks small but charming all the same. India brings the wonderful Richard Jenkins and a solid piece of advise: "don't give up on love" Bali, well, Bali is something else and it is there that Javier Bardem comes into the picture and provides us with the best scene in the film. I'm not going to tell you what it is but let me just say that involves his son and gives us, finally, a side of Julia we didn't know how much we missed. Empathy. Feeling something for somebody else's feelings. I think I may see the film a second time just to see that scene again. I also should mention that James Franco plays a young actor - not what I call a stretch - considering he is my favorite of the young actors around. I will challenge other members of my sex to go and see it. Not to be afraid to feel identified or even chocked up. programme.title: Ona
Her
programme.desc: Osamotniony Theodore kupuje przełomowy program komputerowy. Dzięki niemu komunikuje się z wirtualną postacią, której nadaje imię Samantha. Z czasem zakochuje się w cybernetycznej towarzyszce. Zmuszający do refleksji film o romansie przyszłości, nagrodzony Oscarem i Złotym Globem za scenariusz Spike'a Jonze'a, reżysera "Adaptacji" oraz " Być jak John Malkovich". Głosu Samancie użyczyła Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
Jedz, módl się, kochaj
Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Eat Pray Love: Directed by Ryan Murphy. With Julia Roberts, I. Gusti Ayu Puspawati, Hadi Subiyanto, Billy Crudup. A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0879870/","name":"Eat Pray Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDkyNzkyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQyNDk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0879870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystic Julia","reviewBody":"Most people I know are going to see this film for Julia Roberts. It is that mysterious link that film stars create with their audiences. We develop a sort of craving to see them again. So a new Julia Roberts movie? Sure. Absolutely. I'm only a few years younger than Julia Roberts which means we have grown together. So, to see her play a woman facing a sort of middle age crisis makes you look inwards with a smile, the nervous kind. I must also say I'm a guy, heterosexual, but not fanatically so. I don't have the fears that, Jay Leno for instance, shows, when confronted by a "chick flick" If anything "Eat Pray Love" proves that men and women are not that far apart, we simply deal with the same problems in different ways. Here, the filmmakers don't shy away from the conflict and the balance is real. Julia's husband, played beautifully by Billy Crudup, accuses her of leaving the marriage without an explanation. He is the one with the broken heart. In Italy, Julia eats and our own gastric juices start to do their thing. I glanced at my watch, I was ready to run into the nearest Italian restaurant and have a relationship with a pizza myself. Italy, Rome and even Naples look so clean that I hardly recognized it. CGI? Luca Argentero plays Julia's tutor/tourist guide. He is a good looking guy that after appearing in the Italian version of the Big Brother reality show, he became a sort of local movie star and shows promising acting chops. Here, strangely enough, he looks small but charming all the same. India brings the wonderful Richard Jenkins and a solid piece of advise: "don't give up on love" Bali, well, Bali is something else and it is there that Javier Bardem comes into the picture and provides us with the best scene in the film. I'm not going to tell you what it is but let me just say that involves his son and gives us, finally, a side of Julia we didn't know how much we missed. Empathy. Feeling something for somebody else's feelings. I think I may see the film a second time just to see that scene again. I also should mention that James Franco plays a young actor - not what I call a stretch - considering he is my favorite of the young actors around. I will challenge other members of my sex to go and see it. Not to be afraid to feel identified or even chocked up. I can assure you it's not going to diminish you manliness in any way and will awake your appetites, big time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93565,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-10-06","keywords":"emotional balance,indonesia,inner peace,young woman,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eat Pray Love: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2996176409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Happily married Elizabeth Gilbert (Roberts) takes a right turn in her life by enduring a painful divorce and proceeding to take a round-the-world journey of self-enlightenment and fulfillment. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000849/","name":"Javier Bardem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759022/","name":"Jennifer Salt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2418691/","name":"Elizabeth Gilbert"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MissPearBanana"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awwww","reviewBody":"I saw this movie on Thursdays night after having a really boring day. I had no expectations, those I had were rather negative. Being that the only movie I've ever watched Jimmy in is the American version of Taxi with Queen Latifah(?)...don't ask why! But seriously..this movie is so cute! Drew Barrymore is always sweet, but I almost fell in love with Fallon's character. Why can't I meet a cute nerd like that. :) Movies like that are excellent. Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. Probably the fact that we don't have that sport here in Norway.\n\n(My first comment ever.) programme.title: Nieznany Madagaskar
programme.desc: Niepowtarzalna przyroda Madagaskaru znajduje się w niebezpieczeństwie. Wyspa, która leży na Oceanie Indyjskim, przy wschodnim wybrzeżu Afryki, fascynuje nie tylko bogactwem flory, ale też niezwykłymi endemicznymi gatunkami zwierząt. Niestety, okazuje się, że nie ma ona nic wspólnego z rajem. Autorzy dwuczęściowego dokumentu pokazują, jak szybko człowiek ze swoją gospodarką doprowadza do zniszczenia tamtejszej przyrody, m.in. sporych połaci lasów deszczowych.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
Książę Egiptu
The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: The Prince of Egypt: Directed by Brenda Chapman, Steve Hickner, Simon Wells. With Val Kilmer, Ralph Fiennes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Sandra Bullock. Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120794/","name":"The Prince of Egypt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNjMjgyNmMtNWMzZC00YjI4LWI1NmUtMTY0ZTA0ZDQ4Y2EwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120794/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dilipbts"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The prince of Egypt","reviewBody":"For sheer spectacle, it's tough to beat the Bible. With "The Prince of Egypt," DreamWorks makes good on its promise to deliver a state-of-the-art animated film that will compete favorably with the best Disney has to offer. As with "Antz," released earlier this year, DreamWorks has successfully resisted the temptation to populate this film with characters that can be turned into further revenue through toy sales. (I do wonder, though, if three soundtrack albums--the film's soundtrack, an "inspirational" album, and a "country" album--were really necessary.) The animation team has accomplished something truly spectacular; watching "The Prince of Egypt" is like seeing life breathed into a rich, luxurious tapestry. The Biblical story told in the books of Genesis and Exodus is followed very faithfully, with only minor changes made for dramatic reasons. The action sequences are truly exciting, overall pacing is excellent, and the miracles wrought by God are depicted with awed and respectful wonder. One truly astonishing, harrowing sequence recounts the slaughter of firstborn Hebrew children by bringing hieroglyphic drawings to life on the walls of an Egyptian temple. The voice work is especially good--Val Kilmer is fine as Moses, and Pharoah, voiced by Ralph Fiennes, positively seethes with arrogance and hubris. The storytellers wisely chose to end their tale at the climactic crossing of the Red Sea; even the delivery of the Ten Commandments is portrayed only in an epilogue vignette. (After all, the Israelites wander in the wilderness for forty years after that, and Moses ultimately is not allowed to enter the Promised Land--perhaps not the uplifting ending the filmmakers had in mind.) Some of the subject matter is dark and disturbing, and there is no shying away from the harsh realities of the original texts. By all means, see it with the children in your life--and be prepared to discuss it with them afterward.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":125732,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"(Banned)","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1998-12-16","keywords":"hebrew,ancient egypt,miracle,brother versus brother,bible story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Prince of Egypt","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2683437337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBlYzFhNzMtNWM2My00MmRhLTkxOTgtODdjMWM2OWMyZGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBlYzFhNzMtNWM2My00MmRhLTkxOTgtODdjMWM2OWMyZGJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000174/","name":"Val Kilmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152312/","name":"Brenda Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9054338/","name":"Steve Hickner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920425/","name":"Simon Wells"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493857/","name":"Philip LaZebnik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0583292/","name":"Nicholas Meyer"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All My Life
All My Life
programme.desc: All My Life: Directed by Marc Meyers. With Jessica Rothe, Harry Shum Jr., Marielle Scott, Chrissie Fit. A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8305852/","name":"All My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJiMzBlY2ItZTRjNS00OWFiLWI4YmUtZjVlMmY4OWFhMTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8305852/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LiveLoveLead"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Based on a true story, makes it more endearing!","reviewBody":"Based on a true story (they show the actual couple at the end), this movie takes you on a roller coaster ride of emotions, happy tears and smiles for the sweet romantic parts and sad tears for the heartbreaking parts. It's not the most original or best film out there, but it was a romantic and beautiful story that was very delightful to watch. The characters were charming, the acting was decent, the music was fun, and the message was meaningful. It might be a little to cute/sappy/chick flick for some, but it is an enjoyable and touching film IMHO! Aug2021.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3112,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-04","keywords":"wedding,three word title,terminal illness,cancer,liver cancer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3348087065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY5MmI2ODItMGNhZS00MjQzLTgwYTEtMGViNjZkMDA4NzA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY5MmI2ODItMGNhZS00MjQzLTgwYTEtMGViNjZkMDA4NzA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the powerful true love story that inspired an entire nation, All My Life follows the journey of an engaged couple who make the difficult decision to accelerate their wedding in the wake of a devastating discovery."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557329/","name":"Jessica Rothe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1484270/","name":"Harry Shum Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2900746/","name":"Marielle Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1836315/","name":"Marc Meyers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0739708/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1565798/","name":"Todd Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8305852/","name":"All My Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJiMzBlY2ItZTRjNS00OWFiLWI4YmUtZjVlMmY4OWFhMTIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple's wedding plans are thrown off course when the groom is diagnosed with liver cancer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8305852/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"LiveLoveLead","dateCreated":"2021-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Based on a true story, makes it more endearing!","reviewBody":"Based on a true story (they show the actual couple at the end), this movie takes you on a roller coaster ride of emotions, happy tears and smiles for the sweet romantic parts and sad tears for the heartbreaking parts. It's not the most original or best film out there, but it was a romantic and beautiful story that was very delightful to watch. The characters were charming, the acting was decent, the music was fun, and the message was meaningful. It might be a little to cute/sappy/chick flick for some, but it is an enjoyable and touching film IMHO! programme.title: Body Brokers
Straceńcy
Body Brokers
programme.desc: Body Brokers: Directed by John Swab. With Suzanne Wind, Frank Grillo, Alice Englert, Samone James. Brought to Los Angeles for treatment, a recovering junkie soon learns that the rehab center is not about helping people, but a cover for a multi-billion-dollar fraud operation that enlists addicts to recruit other addicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9585676/","name":"Body Brokers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmYzMjQ4ZTAtMjI0OC00ZDhiLWJkMzctMDgxYTI2ZDRiYTg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brought to Los Angeles for treatment, a recovering junkie soon learns that the rehab center is not about helping people, but a cover for a multi-billion-dollar fraud operation that enlists addicts to recruit other addicts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9585676/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xavier_Stone"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A unique tale, a bit overdone and barely alright","reviewBody":"The start and setup of this movie is decent and it tells an interesting story. However the financials are way out of whack and ruins any true insight. The wandering path is done adequately enough but it feels half finished and leaves an unsatisfied feeling at the completion. Maybe it's just me, but if you're going to make a movie about preaching the dangers of drugs and wanting people to change I think you need to put an effort into making a good film. Otherwise it's easily forgotten 5 minutes after watching it, like this one is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2213,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-02-19","keywords":"los angeles california,drug addiction,addiction,fraud,reference to the affordable care act","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2724708633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTVjODUwYjktOTM3OC00OGZhLWI0MGYtOWU4ODFkNTFkMDk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTVjODUwYjktOTM3OC00OGZhLWI0MGYtOWU4ODFkNTFkMDk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Utah and Opal are junkies living on the streets of rural Ohio until a seemingly chance encounter with the enigmatic Wood (Michael Kenneth Williams) brings them to Los Angeles for treatment. While Utah finds sobriety with the help of the treatment center shrink (Academy Award®-Winner Melissa Leo), he soon learns that rehab is not about helping people--it's merely a cover scheme for a multibillion dollar fraud operation, enlisting addicts to recruit other addicts. Seduced by the money, but troubled by the hypocrisy, Utah must decide between what will make him rich, and what will save Opal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12333318/","name":"Suzanne Wind"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2129444/","name":"Alice Englert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6461537/","name":"John Swab"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320829/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0586673/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6461537/","name":"John Swab"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Z odzysku: Directed by Slawomir Fabicki. With Antoni Pawlicki, Nataliya Vdovina, Jacek Braciak, Dimitri Melnichuk. 19 year old Wojtek lives in a poverty stricken Polish town. He is in love with an older woman, an illegal emigrant from Ukraine. He boxes in illegal matches to get money and is spotted by a man running a security business. programme.title: The Scheme
The Crew
programme.desc:
The Scheme: Directed by Pat Kondelis. With Christian Dawkins, Sean Miller, Will Wade. The true story of basketball insider Christian Dawkins, who hustled the FBI in a scandal that threatened to take down the NCAA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11916278/","name":"The Scheme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRmOGI1NGQtMmI2Ny00YjQ2LTg5YTgtYTU2ZTY5MDY4MTgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true story of basketball insider Christian Dawkins, who hustled the FBI in a scandal that threatened to take down the NCAA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11916278/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"philip-00197"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Misdirected bias.","reviewBody":"The Scheme appears to lack just that. It's hard to determine what Kondelis is trying to achieve with this: The inefficiency of law enforcement? The corruption of sport? The, relative innocence of Christian Dawkins?

Despite not focusing on any given topic, the overall sensation is that The Scheme is lacking in a prerequisite for documentaries - objectivity.

Why take the viewpoint that Dawkins, who is obviously knee deep in a crooked system, should be the chosen voice to criticise said system?

There is an element of truth in the fact that he got hard done by in relation to his involvement - but a nuance of raw deal hardly makes for a great documentary.

If you're looking to criticise the system - do so. If you're using Dawkins to demonstrate a miscarriage of justice - there are thousands more deserving.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-03-31","keywords":"ncaa,professional basketball,hustler,bribery,fbi investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11465806/","name":"Christian Dawkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11465807/","name":"Sean Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11465808/","name":"Will Wade"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2897692/","name":"Pat Kondelis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0462903/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le prince oublié
Mój książę z bajki
Le prince oublié
programme.desc:
Le prince oublié: Directed by Michel Hazanavicius. With Omar Sy, Bérénice Bejo, François Damiens, Sarah Gaye. Every night as Sofia falls asleep, her father Djibi takes her into "Storyland", a fantasy film studio where their extraordinary fairy-tale adventures come to life starring Djibi in the lead role as the heroic Prince Charming." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8335482/","name":"Le prince oublié","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTJiZWEyNDMtNWNjOC00ZGJhLWExZjYtOTRhZmNlNjg0YzEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA3MzQ4MTc0._V1_.jpg","description":"Every night as Sofia falls asleep, her father Djibi takes her into "Storyland", a fantasy film studio where their extraordinary fairy-tale adventures come to life starring Djibi in the lead role as the heroic Prince Charming.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8335482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"isaacochoterena"},"dateCreated":"2021-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining but with rare moments","reviewBody":"In this film the plot is well constructed, although the ending is unsatisfactory.

The theme of growing up, maturing and how parents perceive it in their children is exposed. There are very good things like some special effects, how the story tells and how the brain perceives the phenomenon of growing up. Although there are times when it looks a bit like Inside Out and Toy Story, the ending feels empty and the closing is unsatisfactory.

It is a movie with a good message about growing up and with a good story to tell, but the ending ruins what was previously built.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1149,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-02-12","keywords":"night","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3936402969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5ZGU3M2QtMjMyYS00NDJlLTgyZGUtN2I4NmMxYjliYmYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzM5ZGU3M2QtMjMyYS00NDJlLTgyZGUtN2I4NmMxYjliYmYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1082477/","name":"Omar Sy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067367/","name":"Bérénice Bejo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460782/","name":"François Damiens"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371890/","name":"Michel Hazanavicius"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0775436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1315212/","name":"Bruno Merle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4380548/","name":"Noé Debré"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0371890/","name":"Michel Hazanavicius"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Federico Ielapi, Roberto Benigni, Rocco Papaleo, Massimo Ceccherini, Marine Vacth, Gigi Proietti, Alida Baldari Calabria, Alessio Di Domenicantonio, Maria Pia Timo

programme.title: Amazon, ufam Tobie
programme.desc: Amazon to amerykańskie przedsiębiorstwo handlowe, które jest jedną z najpotężniejszych korporacji na świecie. Istnieje na rynku od lat 90., najpierw jako księgarnia internetowa, dzisiaj jako międzynarodowy technologiczny gigant. Oprócz sprzedaży, zajmuje się m.in. produkcją własnych pozycji filmowych. Twórcy dokumentu szukają odpowiedzi na pytanie, jaki jest wpływ Amazona na nasze życie, kulturę, prawo oraz etykę pracy.

programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job.
